grade: Jōyō kanji, taught in junior high
on reading compounds: 悼辞【トウジ】funeral address, message of condolence, words of condolence
追悼【ツイトウ】mourning (dead persons), memorial
戦没者追悼【センボツシャツイトウ】war memorial, memorial (monument) to war dead
kun reading compounds: 悼む【いたむ】to grieve over, to mourn, to lament
